title: Is luck or chance totally random? Or is there a pattern to it (in general everyday life and not a particular situation)? Is there a mathematical explanation for either an affirmative or negative answer? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is the saying that God helps those who help themselves. As a ready reckoner it would suffice to say that life is about fifty percent luck and fifty percent hard work. Why some people happen to be lucky and some unlucky cannot be explained though positive/negative thinking also play their part. Way back a British Member of Parliament had concluded his maiden speech by referring to luck in the following verse:— “I enjoy her when she is kind. But when she dances in the wind, shakes her wings and does not stay. I puff the prostitute away.”
